entry.title: Ida Theatersport Liga
entry.content:
Theater Ida is organizing a theater sports liga with shows in English.

Theater Ida presents the Ida Theatersport Liga. 2 teams will compete with the weapons of improvisation theatre. The audience and jury decide and award the points. It will be tough, it will be exciting, it will...

entry.title: Theater Sports by ZIC: DTMM VS ZIC
entry.content:
Zurich Improv Comedy (ZIC) is organizing a theater sports show and they invited us to participate.

The home team, Zurich Improv Comedy (ZIC), competes in each show against a different improv group from Switzerland. The two teams improvise scenes based on audience suggestions. It is also the...

entry.title: a penny for my thoughts
entry.content:
An improvised play based on a game where characters will try to recover their lost memories.

We will ask the audience to come up with “memory triggers” to help our “patients” throughout their journey.

The first half of the show will be short form improv games that you...

entry.title: Open Stage + a penny for my thoughts @ Dynamo
entry.content:
Tobertus Habicht invited us to their open stage and to premiere our new format “a penny for my thoughts”.

This is an english evening: In the first half there is an open stage: come, watch or jump on stage with us, you decide! We play our (and your?)...

entry.title: PREMISE + GAME in IMPROV SCENES
entry.content:
Do you want to be able to pull ideas from an opening and use them to initiate scenes? Do you fancy yourself as having a ‘writer’s brain’ and want to channel that to make your scenes even stronger? Do you want your improv scenes to look like masterful comedy sketches?!

...

entry.title: A new life!
entry.content:
The mushrooms are back on 2021!

Improv is what happens when the actors don’t know what will happen: A totally spontaneous spectacle, made up on the spot and based on suggestions from the audience members! Come for a fantastical time full of unexpected surprises.

entry.title: Improfight: Don't Touch My Mushroom VS Dodecahedron
entry.content:
This show has been cancelled due to COVID19.

We will see you on stage again in 2021!

Our impro fight will set two impro groups face to face on stage and make them compete for more applause from the audience....

entry.title: Theater Sports by ZIC: DTMM VS ZIC
entry.content:
Zurich Improv Comedy (ZIC) is organizing a theater sports show and they invited us to participate.

Team against team – improviser against improviser – Titan against Titan!

The home team, Zurich Improv Comedy (ZIC), competes in each show against a different improv group from Switzerland. The two...

entry.title: The Harold
entry.content:
The Harold is a longform improvised format which emphasises patterns, themes and group discoveries instead of a traditional plot or story. Everything starts from a simple suggestion from the audience. The Game of the scene is not predetermined. We create Games and their rules in the moment.

Doors open...

entry.title: First online Improv show
entry.content: No virus is going to prevent us from doing what we like most! Don’t Touch My Mushroom adapts to the circumstances and brings us a fully online improv show experience. We might face a pandemic, technical difficulties and a confinement, but we hope we can bring a smile to your...
